def code():
    cases = int(input())
    for _ in range(cases):
        (a_mili, b_water, Xa, Xb) = map(int, input().split(' '))
        type_A_coco = Xa / a_mili
        type_B_coco = Xb / b_water
        print(int(type_A_coco + type_B_coco))

tests = int(input())
while tests:
    (xa, xb, Ta, Tb) = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
    (ca, cb) = (Ta // xa + Ta % xa, Tb // xb + Tb % xb)
    print(ca + cb)
    tests -= 1

t = int(input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    (a, b, c, d) = map(int, input().split())
    print(c // a + d // b)
